website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Series 7 (DP700A3D-A01US) all-in-one desktop has a very good bang for the buck, and includes a lot of features we'd say are must-haves in a new midrange all-in-one desktop with Windows 8.

customer_reviews.title: The computer is pretty average. Not as easy to set up as ...
customer_reviews.text: The computer is pretty average. Not as easy to set up as many reviewers have stated but they probably have more advanced skills. A chip to activate the mouse and keyboard is in the mouse???? The screen tells you what to plug in but if you do not know the technical words, it takes some trial and error. Took help from 2 fairly sophisticated young adults and quite a bit of time but we are enjoying it now. Just do not buy from Amazing Lightening Deals-they are unresponsive, have vague return directions, do not directly answer questions and charge huge fees and hassle to return an item. Windows 8 is dazzling.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was going back and forth between this and the 27". Since I was unsure of the Windows 8 platform I went for the less expensive 23" model. As for the unit itself Samsung did a great job. It looks and feels impressive. Very snappy performance. Windows 8 seems very interesting and I do like the touch screen alot. The picture quality is also very nice. I am very pleased with this purchase so far.

product_meta.title: Samsung Series 7 DP700A3D-A01US 23-Inch All-in-One Touchscreen Desktop
product_meta.description:
Simply put, Samsung Series 7 All-In-One PCs are absolutely beautiful. An elegant aesthetic and brilliant HD displays featuring touch screen technology garner ultimate style points for your home or office. And once you finally get beyond the cutting-edge design, you’ll discover a PC that offers everything you demand. From emails to multimedia presentations to Web browsing and more, Series 7 All-In-One PCs truly live up to their name. 


The Series 7 All-In-One with 23.6-inch Full HD 1080p touchscreen display (view larger). 

Gesture Control for a whole new PC experience (view larger). DP700A3D-A01US
SERIES 7 ALL-IN-ONE
AT A GLANCE:
 * 23.6-inch Full HD 1080p touch-enabled display
   
   
 * 2.9 GHz Intel Core i5-3470T processor
   
   
 * 1 TB SATA2 hard drive
   
   
 * 6 GB installed RAM
   
   
 * Integrated Intel HD Graphics
   
   
 * DVD±RW Super Multi 
   dual-layer drive
   
   
 * Wireless-N Wi-Fi + Bluetooth
   
   
 * HDMI input and output
   
   
 * See full specs below


Explore your favorite apps, websites and more with touch screen and gesture control technology. Access the Web, type and send emails, chat with friends and more with the simple touch of the screen. 
23.6-INCH HIGH DEFINITION TOUCH SCREEN
The 23.6-inch multi-touch screen has a viewing angle up to 178˚ and can detect up to 10 pressure points for a seamless and more efficient user experience. 


GESTURE CONTROL

Use gesture control to adjust the volume of your device from across the room , play games and even control the cursor without touching the device

Elegant and beautiful touchscreen (view larger). SHARE APPS AND CONTENT ACROSS DEVICES WITH THE TOUCH OF A FINGER

Now you can connect your Series 7 All-In-One PC with multiple compatible devices via the Internet. Download content from a Samsung Smart TV, smart phone or camera running AllShare™ technology. Stream music, movies and photos from your Series 7 All-In-one PC to your Smart TV.


CUSTOMIZABLE USER SETTINGS
Be even more productive with user settings designed with you in mind. The most commonly used features are designed to be fast and simple to use. And you have complete control over it all. Change networks in the blink of an eye and customize sound and vision with a simple touch of the screen. Adjust power settings to improve productivity without sacrificing performance. Switch from touch screen interaction to a traditional PC experience with the included wireless keyboard and mouse.



DISCOVER THE NEW, BEAUTIFUL, FAST AND FLUID WINDOWS 8

Reimagined to be all about you, Windows 8 lets you personalize your desktop and gives you instant access to all your favorite people, apps, sites and more. Use S Manager to keep your PC running smoothly with the latest software and drivers, and to download Samsung’s Quick Starter feature, which adds a toolbar and start button for easy navigation. Plus, connect to SkyDrive® and store files, photos, videos and more, so wherever you go, you’re connected to the cloud.

WIRELESS KEYBOARD AND MOUSE
In keeping with the Series 7 AIO's simple and elegant design, the included keyboard and mouse are wireless.






KEY SPECIFICATIONS
23.6-inch LED-backlit, touchscreen display with 1920 x 1080-pixel resolution for native Full HD 1080p viewing 


2.9 GHz Intel Core i5-3470T dual-core processor (3 MB L3 cache)

1 TB SATA2 hard drive (5400 RPM)

6 GB of installed DDR3 RAM (8 GB maximum)

Integrated Intel HD Graphics 4000 for casual and mainstream gaming (supports Microsoft DirectX 10)

DVD±RW Super Multi Dual Layer (S-ATA) Drive

1.0-megapixel HD webcam

Built-in stereo speakers (14 watts total; 7W x 2)

Dimensions and Weight: 22.6" x 7" x 17.3 inches (WxDxH); 18.74 pounds

 * Microphone and headphone jacks
